title: Konzepte und Anwendungen der Pitch-Class Set Theory
text:
Course plan

19.04.2023: Introduction, History of Atonal Theory
26.04.2023: Basic Concepts and Definitions
03.05.2023: entfällt (Vorträge NF Konrad)
10.05.2023: Analyse I
17.05.2023: Python Implementation
24.05.2023: online (cont.)
31.05.2023: Recapitulation, PC Sets
07.06.2023: Implementation
14.06.2023: Analyse II
23.06.2023: Special relationships / Implementation
28.06.2023: Analyse III
05.07.2023: Centricity, Referential Collections, Triadic Post-Tonality
12.07.2023: Twelve-Tone Operations, Implementation
19.07.2023: Further Twelve-Tone Topics, Discussion and Conclusion

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.




Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: 2  Summary
text: In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
